| Command                            | Description                                     |
|------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|
| Alt + 1                            | Show method reference popup                     |
| Ctrl + -                           | Navigate backwards                              |
| Ctrl + Shift + -                   | Navigate forward                                |
| Ctrl + F12                         | Go to implementation                            |
| Alt + F12                          | Peek  Definition                                |
| F12                                | Go to  Definition                               |
